summary: This document is an email chain between a law clerk for Judge Alison J. Nathan and counsel regarding an order in case 20-cr-330. The law clerk attaches an order from Judge Nathan and requests that defense counsel file notices of appearance on the docket.

persons.name: Alison J. Nathan
persons.context: Judge Nathan issued an order in case 20-cr-330, and her law clerk is communicating with counsel about it.

events.title: Order Issued in 20-cr-330
events.description: Judge Alison J. Nathan issued an order in case 20-cr-330, which was communicated to counsel via email by her law clerk.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain regarding an order from Judge Alison J. Nathan in case 20-cr-330.
The law clerk requests that defense counsel file notices of appearance on the docket.
The email includes an attachment of the order, referenced as '20cr330_Order 7.7.20.pdf'.
